abstract: The long-delayed offshore wind power project in Nantucket Sound will begin negotiations with a major utility to sell the power it plans to generate.
snippet: The long-delayed offshore wind power project in Nantucket Sound will begin negotiations with a major utility to sell the power it plans to generate.
lead_paragraph: Cape Wind, the long-delayed offshore wind power project in Nantucket Sound, will begin negotiations with a major utility, National Grid, to sell the power it plans to generate.

headline.main: Cape Wind Power Purchase Talks Are Set
